reviews.name: Felicia Fernandez
reviews.review: 'FitNs' has helped me reach my fitness goals in such a short amount of time, meaning I don't have to sacrifice family time.

reviews.name: Sarah Marshall
reviews.summary: Great features to keep you motivated
reviews.review: Tracking my progress really gives me the motivation to keep pushing in the workouts.

reviews.name: Daryl Long
reviews.review: I feel so good after each workout, I can't wait to try more!

reviews.name: Russell Cunningham
reviews.review: No time wasted finding the right meals to supplement my training, eveything I need in one place. I would recommend to anyone!
